participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and determined, Emily has a passion for justice and a love for animals.
participant_1.background: my family has raised horses for a generations. i want to be a lawyer. i was raised on a horse farm. i am from a small town. i dream of moving to the city.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, Lily enjoys video games as an escape and often feels lonely.
participant_2.background: i love to play pobox. i am a 12 year old girl. i don't have many friends. i hate school. i have blue eyes and red hair that comes to my waist.
